text: Chinawambasye ku ma Aya Gangu awala waakulikwesya pa chilambo mwangali ligongo lyakuona, mwanti naga ali achiweni chilosyo chilichose ngakasachikulupililaga, soni naga ali aliweni litala lyachongoko ngakulitenda kuwa litala, nambo naga aliweni litala lyakusokonechela akulitendaga kuwa litala, yalakweyo ni ligongo lyanti wanganyao wakaaniile ilosyo Yetu, niwaliji soni ali nkuikwanjila
